definitions.definition: The belief that there are distinct human races with inherent differences which determine their abilities , and generally that some are superior and others inferior .
The policies , practices , or systems (e.g. government or political) promoting this belief or promoting the dominance of one or more races over others.
examples: Martin Luther King spoke out against racism .

definitions.definition: Prejudice or discrimination based upon race or ethnicity ; ( countable ) an action of such discrimination.

main_definition: The belief that there are distinct human races with inherent differences which determine their abilities , and generally that some are superior and others inferior .

Prejudice or discrimination based upon race or ethnicity ; ( countable ) an action of such discrimination.
